text: typedef long long ll ; int main ( ) { int t , i ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , p ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; ll * a = ( ll * ) malloc ( sizeof ( ll ) * n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , a + i ) ; int s = n ; int r = 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] >= a [ i - 1 ] ) { r ++ ; } else { p = ( r * ( r - 1 ) ) >> 1 ; s = s + p ; r = 1 ; } } p = ( r * ( r - 1 ) ) >> 1 ; s = s + p ; printf ( "%d\n" , s ) ; } return 0 ; }
